nodes.text: The stalker lizard was a reptile native to the planet of Dantooine. Possessing a purple-blue skin color and moving relatively low to the ground, the animal perfectly matched the color of the native grasses, making it a stealthily-camouflaged pack-predator. They dined on nettars in the early morning and evening, and could grow to over three meters—9.8 feet—in length.
